title: Stopwatch (android wear)
summary: Advanced stopwatch app with android wear support.

descriptionHTML:
Stopwatch (android wear) is an advanced and easy to use stopwatch app, with a great design. This app comes with android wear support. Use the stopwatch app on your wearable independently or synchronize the laps and time with your phone.

Features:
 •Android wear support
 •Android 8.0 Oreo support
 •Samsung multi-window support
 •Time in milliseconds, seconds and minutes
 •save to the sd-card in Excel format (.xls) or in Text format (.txt)
 •Share your times via social media
 •Control the stopwatch via notification.
 •Customize your own theme
 •Fastest and slowest lap shown in green and red
 •No ads and completely free!

Wear:
 •Start/ stop, add laps and reset the stopwatch
 •View laps on the wearable
 •Standalone and Synchronized

On supported devices:
 •Start/stop with the top side button
 •Add lap on the bottom side button when stopwatch is running
 •Reset the stopwatch if stopwatch is not running
comments: Edit: Working as designed now. Uninstalled from phone and watch. Reinstalled. Working. Simple design that works well so far. Would love to see a timer / interval timer added to the app as well.   Seems to work on the phone. Can't get past the first screen on the watch though. Also, every time I open the app I get the tutorial pages again.  Tutorial is on the phone. And its a Ticwatch S with Android Wear 2.8. Would love to be able to use this.

Great app.  'X' symbols halfway outside the screen in light theme. Buttons in cards theme are better on the lower side. Please give option for  changing font color  and it would be nice if the delete symbol is scaled down a bit. ðŸ˜Š

I couldn't believe how poor the stopwatch selection was for Android Wear coming form a Pebble. Something basic like laps missing was a deal breaker and if you left the app up you couldn't tell the time. This app fixes those basic problems. I still wish there was one stop watch and timer app with even more functions, but this is more than adequate and better than the stock option. Being able to change the lap from the card and not opening the app is very handy.
Thank you. This is by far the BEST stopwatch app for Android wear.
Awesome app for runners. Great for interval training. Simple to use and u can export the lap times. Thanks!

Best stopwatch for Android Wear The default Wear stopwatch has major issues when running - it doesn't stay on screen, the card for it doesn't remain at the top of the pile, and there are no start/stop controls from the card. Basically it's useless for timing things with any degree of accuracy. This app fixes all that, looks better and backs up the results. Should be the standard for all Wear devices!
recentChanges: -Fixed crash when buttons in the tutorial were pressed too rapidly.
-Moved to a new installation method on wear 1.x, if you experience any issues let me know
-->Choose the primary color and font color
-Text now automatically scales to make the most use of the available screen.
